amendment.description: To add the provisions of the Armed Forces Tax Fairness Act of 2003.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 612 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 612 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR 5/14/2003 S6247-6248) To add the provisions of the Armed Forces Tax Fairness Act of 2003.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 612 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator McCain.
